Name: Prestige
Ingredients: 52.5 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Garnish with pineapple wedge on rim.
Review: Aged rum, pineapple, and lime are used with delicate but enlivening clove spice.
History: Adapted from a recipe created in 2002 by Dale DeGroff , New York City, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Prestige contains 231 calories
